text: The Črnivec Pass (), usually just Črnivec, is a mountain pass in the Kamnik Alps that connects the traditional regions of Upper Carniola and Styria in Slovenia. Approaching the pass from the west It lies on the drainage divide between the Kamnik Bistrica and Dreta rivers. The road connecting Kamnik and Gornji Grad traverses the pass. ==External links== *Črnivec at Geopedia * Category:Mountain passes of Slovenia
title: Črnivec Pass
